1299.question: Do they report results only on English data?
1299.response: {'Answer': 'The paper reports results on both English and non-English data.'}

1303.question: What are the 12 AV approaches which are examined?
1303.response:
{'Answer': '12 authorship verification approaches are examined in this paper, which are listed in the following table:

| AV Method | Model Category | Optimizability | Determinism |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| MOCC | Unary | Deterministic | Optimizable |
| OCCAV | Unary | Deterministic | Non-optimizable |
| COAV | Binary-Intrinsic | Deterministic | Optimizable |
| Aveer | Binary-Intrinsic | Deterministic | Optimizable |
| GLAD | Binary-Intrinsic | Deterministic | Optimizable |
| DistAV | Binary-Intrinsic | Deterministic | Optimizable |
| Unmasking | Binary-Intrinsic | Non-deterministic | Optimizable |
| Caravel | Binary-Extrinsic | Non-deterministic | Optimizable |
| GenLM | Binary-Extrinsic | Non-deterministic | Optimizable |
| ImpGI | Binary-Extrinsic | Non-deterministic | Optimizable |
| SPATIUM | Binary-Extrinsic | Non-deterministic | Non-optimizable |
| NNCD | Binary-Extrinsic | Deterministic | Non-optimizable |'}
1303.answer: MOCC, OCCAV, COAV, AVeer, GLAD, DistAV, Unmasking, Caravel, GenIM, ImpGI, SPATIUM and NNCD
